akas: Слатки Мали Лаги Republic of Macedonia
Nhung Thien Than Noi Doi Vietnam
akas from release info: Слатки Мали Лаги Republic of Macedonia
Nhung Thien Than Noi Doi Vietnam

1.title: Tick-Tock, Bitches
1.plot: The liars rush to save Hanna after she's abducted by Über A, and the only way is to turn over evidence that will reveal who really murdered Charlotte DiLaurentis.

2.title: Bedlam
2.plot: Worried that Ali is being tortured by Uber A, the liars turn to a potential enemy for help.

3.title: The Talented Mr. Rollins
3.plot: To save Ali from Über A's threats, the liars snap into action to rescue her, but a deadly mistake is made which changes everything.

4.title: Hit and Run, Run, Run
4.plot: The liars made a mistake and now they're trying to hide it, but their romantic relationships will bear the brunt of their actions.

5.title: Along Comes Mary
5.plot: Ali is released into the care of Mary Drake; Spencer and Hanna search for a missing Caleb; Aria and Emily stumble upon a secret apartment.

6.title: Wanted: Dead or Alive
6.plot: Hanna wonders if she should reveal the truth to the police; Ali learns her friends turned her in to Uber A; Someone is killed for being on the wrong team.

7.title: Original G'A'ngsters
7.plot: Jason returns and goes all-out in order to get rid of Mary; The liars learn something new about Mary and Jessica; Ezra gets a call about someone in his past.

8.title: Exes and OMGs
8.plot: Emily and Paige apply for the same job; Hannah is visited by Mrs. Grunwald; Ali returns to work; Spencer and Aria pursue answers from the doctor who delivered Mary's baby.

9.title: The Wrath of Kahn
9.plot: Hanna goes rogue to prove that Noel is Über A; Emily unexpectedly turns to Paige for comfort; Jason and Aria look into Mary's past.

10.title: The DArkest Knight
10.plot: The liars face off with their enemies in a chaotic fight that ends fatally; One liar learns a secret about her past; Another discovers something about her future.

11.title: Playtime
11.plot: With more secrets being uncovered, the liars all have something to deal with; A.D sets a game for the liars.

12.title: These Boots Were Made for Stalking
12.plot: Emily butts heads with teenager Addison; Spencer confronts her mother; Aria confides in Holden; Jenna stirs up trouble when she returns.

13.title: Hold Your Piece
13.plot: Aria and Emily team up to investigate Sydney; Spencer grows closer to Detective Furey; Hanna's turn at the game is more intense than she bargained for.

14.title: Power Play
14.plot: Ali's turn at the game forces her to face a monumental personal decision; Hanna and Spencer run into a familiar face with a shocking secret.

15.title: In the Eye Abides the Heart
15.plot: After being blackmailed by A.D, one of the liars begins to pass to the dark side to protect those closest to her.

16.title: The Glove That Rocks the Cradle
16.plot: With the Rosewood P.D closing in, the liars try to destroy any evidence that would incriminate one of their own.

17.title: Driving Miss Crazy
17.plot: Emily teams up with Mona; Ashley returns after learning frightening information; Spencer's family reels from A.D's latest taunt.

18.title: Choose or Lose
18.plot: The Rosewood PD turn up the heat on the liars; A.D. presents the liars with a choice designed to drive a wedge between them; Aria makes a horrifying discovery.

19.title: Farewell, My Lovely
19.plot: The Liars gear up for a confrontation with A.D.; Spencer, Hanna and Caleb discover new information regarding Charlotte's death.

20.title: Til DeAth Do Us PArt
20.plot: Secrets come tumbling out as the ultimate endgame comes to light and A.D. is revealed.

1.title: Pilot
1.plot: One year after the mysterious disappearance of Alison Dilaurentis, her friends believe their secrets are safe forever, but the truth may be only one text away.

2.title: The Jenna Thing
2.plot: Flashbacks from Aria, Spencer, Hanna and Emily's past occur when blind girl, Jenna, shows up in Rosewood. Aria tries to stay away from her English teacher, Ezra Fitz. Emily and Maya share a short kiss.

3.title: To Kill a Mocking Girl
3.plot: Aria has an unsettling encounter with Meredith; Emily is forced to see Toby in a new light; Spencer is reeling in the wake of a vengeful Melissa.

4.title: Can You Hear Me Now?
4.plot: The liars take matters into their own hands and try to put a stop to "A" by blocking all unknown users, but their problems are far from over.

5.title: Reality Bites Me
5.plot: Trying to ignore "A" backfired for the liars and now they must pay the penalty as they deal with typical teenage drama - the boy kind.

6.title: There's No Place Like Homecoming
6.plot: The homecoming dance is supposed to be a time for fun and making memories, but for the liars, disturbing secrets threaten to ruin their perfect night.

7.title: The Homecoming Hangover
7.plot: After the homecoming dance, the liars try to sort out the devastation; "A" isn't the only one sending Aria texts as tensions rise in the Montgomery household..

8.title: Please, Do Talk About Me When I'm Gone
8.plot: Last-minute preparations for Alison's memorial get derailed when her brother, Jason DiLaurentis arrives back in Rosewood, and saying goodbye is at the bottom of his list.

9.title: The Perfect Storm
9.plot: The liars are trapped at school as a bad storm brews, and tensions run high; Byron leans on Ashley for advice on parenting as his relationship with Ella takes a bad turn.

10.title: Keep Your Friends Close
10.plot: The liars go glamping for Mona's birthday as A's threats escalate and the FBI arrives in Rosewood. But not even a mani-pedi can lift the girls' spirits when the evening takes a dangerous turn.

11.title: Moments Later
11.plot: Moments after Hanna is hit by a car, the liars' world is turned upside down, as "A" is no longer content playing a game of cat and mouse.

12.title: Salt Meets Wound
12.plot: As the liars try their best to support Hanna's release from the hospital, they each have their own surprises to deal with.

13.title: Know Your Frenemies
13.plot: As Noel steps up his pursuit of Ezra, him and Aria start to feel like there may be no way out; Pam's perceived tolerance of Maya comes to a screeching halt; Spencer must handle the return of happy newlyweds Melissa and Ian; "A" has Hanna jumping through old habit hoops with regard to the stolen money.

14.title: Careful What U Wish 4
14.plot: The school's dance-a-thon gives the liars more than sore feet; Aria's old babysitter, Simone, comes to visit and sets her sights on Ezra.

15.title: If at First You Don't Succeed, Lie, Lie Again
15.plot: Emily deals with a jealous teammate; Aria and Ezra their first public date; Spencer turns to Jason for information.

16.title: Je Suis Une Amie
16.plot: Emily and Paige are pitted against each other in the big race; Caleb calls in his favor with a guilty Hanna; Spencer takes on the task of tutoring a fellow student to get answers.

17.title: The New Normal
17.plot: It's parent-teacher conferences and one little liar's father sits face to face with the love of her life. Better believe that "A" has something to say about it.

18.title: The Badass Seed
18.plot: As tensions rise, the girls ponder the true nature of evil; Aria views the school play as an opportunity to get closer to Ezra, but will her plan backfire?

19.title: A Person of Interest
19.plot: After a shocking revelation from the police, it looks like the liars could be crying wolf. With everything pointing to Ian, could the girls be wrong?

20.title: Someone to Watch Over Me
20.plot: As the heat is turned up on suspicions surrounding Spencer, the liars must come to the harsh realization that they aren't the only ones hiding secrets in Rosewood.

21.title: Monsters in the End
21.plot: Everyone has something to hide, but having to live with those secrets can become a big burden for the liars; Spencer and Toby aren't able to be seen together; Rosewood police officer Garrett keeps his promise to keep a close eye on the girls - much closer than they realize.

22.title: For Whom the Bell Tolls
22.plot: In the season one finale, the girls go to an unlikely source for help to put an end to "A" and the mystery surrounding their friend. Can they really stop "A" once and for all?

1.title: It's Alive
1.plot: The liars face the fallout from what happened with Ian at the church, their parents have them talk with a therapist; Caleb returns to see Hanna; Spencer is told Toby is off-limits.

2.title: The Goodbye Look
2.plot: Emily struggles with her family's impending move to Texas; Spencer tries to be supportive of Toby's new plans; Ezra's begs Aria to work things out, but is there anything left to say?

3.title: My Name Is Trouble
3.plot: The liars try to keep their distance from each other; Spencer notches up her suspicions about what is going on in the DiLaurentis house, with Jason moving back in.

4.title: Blind Dates
4.plot: Hanna helps Lucas with his date, until Caleb is thrown into the mix; Aria has a chance encounter with Jason, which brings back some surprising memories.

5.title: The Devil You Know
5.plot: With the shocking news about Ian making the rounds through Rosewood, the liars and their families all try to cope with the outcome; Hanna gets a surprising look into Caleb's life after his shady foster mother surfaces.

6.title: Never Letting Go
6.plot: On the eve of the Rosewood Charity Fashion Show, the liars are surprised with Jessica DiLaurentis' return to town and her request that they participate in the show on Alison's behalf; Spencer quickly learns that Mona has stepped in and taken charge of running the event.

7.title: Surface Tension
7.plot: The girls are uneasy as each confronts complicated matters. Ezra and Jason are invited to a dinner party at the Montgomerys and vie for Aria's attention.

8.title: Save the Date
8.plot: When Emily's dad surprises her before a big swim meet, the pressure sends her to the hospital; Spencer and Aria use the opportunity to dig for clues about Alison's death.

9.title: Picture This
9.plot: Spencer is determined to find out what Jason is hiding at his house; Aria can't seem to get Jason off her mind for a different reason; Hanna helps Caleb with a difficult decision about his family.

10.title: Touched by an 'A'-ngel
10.plot: Aria tries to process Spencer and Emily's news about Jason while dealing with her feelings for him; Hanna tries to be nice to her future stepsister Kate; 'A' turns up the heat on Emily by trying to push her to breaking point.

11.title: I Must Confess
11.plot: The liars finally reveal the torment "A" has put them through to the one person they trust outside their group, Dr. Anne Sullivan, but could she be next on "A's" target list?

12.title: Over My Dead Body
12.plot: All is not what it seems as "A" sends the girls on a hunt to destroy lives. Can the liars go through with their given tasks in order to save one, or will they ignore "A" to save those around them from being hurt?

13.title: The First Secret
13.plot: It's the Halloween before Alison went missing and the friends hope to score an invite to Noel's Halloween party; Jenna challenges Ali for Queen Bee dominance; Aria learns a shocking revelation about Byron.

14.title: Through Many Dangers, Toils, and Snares
14.plot: A month has passed since the liars were arrested and they're at each others' throats and Emily has been iced out completely. But what could have divided them so severely, has "A" finally won the game of divide and conquer?

15.title: A Hot Piece of A
15.plot: The liars, realizing that "A" is not acting alone and their helper may be closer than they think, decide to enlist Caleb's hacking skills.

16.title: Let the Water Hold Me Down
16.plot: With Lucas missing and questions surrounding what happened out on the lake, Hanna can barely catch her breath; Spencer follows a lead about "A" which guides her to an unexpected place and revelation.

17.title: The Blond Leading the Blind
17.plot: Toby continues to pursue Spencer, knowing that she is keeping something from him; Hanna begs the other girls to stop using Caleb to help with their search; Aria is desperate to save her relationship with Ezra.

18.title: A Kiss Before Lying
18.plot: After speaking to her friends about Caleb, Hanna feels they are giving her the cold shoulder; Emily hopes to re-introduce Maya to her mother.

19.title: The Naked Truth
19.plot: Aria continues to question Holden on what exactly he is up to during their "date nights"; Hanna tries to figure out the latest situation with Kate; Emily gets help from an unlikely source to get back on the Rosewood swim team.

20.title: CTRL:A
20.plot: Hanna's worst nightmare comes to fruition when Caleb becomes a target of "A" and his computer is in possession of the cops; Aria learns what Holden's been keeping a secret.

21.title: Breaking the Code
21.plot: A surprising new victim of "A" is revealed; Spencer runs from her family troubles right into Wren's arms; Ezra's new opportunity could push him away from Aria.

22.title: Father Knows Best
22.plot: With fathers looking to make amends and daughters trying to keep the peace, Rosewood's annual Father-Daughter Dance looks to be anything but fun; Ashley continues her hunt to find answers about what is going on with Hanna with help from a surprising source.

23.title: Eye of the Beholder
23.plot: The liars are on the quest for answers of what Alison knew before she died; Jason drops off a bag of Alison's personal items that could be more than just a bag of junk; Toby's return to Rosewood brings a surprise reunion that ends dangerously.

24.title: If These Dolls Could Talk
24.plot: The hunt for answers about what Ali knew leads Aria, Emily, Hanna and Spencer to a rundown doll hospital that holds more than just secrets.

25.title: unmAsked
25.plot: The girls go to the hotel Ali checked in before she disappeared. Spencer discovers Mona's secret. Dr Sullivan comes back to Rosewood.

1.title: It Happened 'That Night'
1.plot: As the second anniversary of Alison's disappearance nears, Aria, Emily, Hanna and Spencer are thrown back into turmoil after a shocking night.

2.title: Blood Is the New Black
2.plot: One of Aria's past indiscretions is fodder for a new "A." A still-shaky Emily tries to focus on school, but could be derailed when she remembers a crucial piece from "that night."

3.title: Kingdom of the Blind
3.plot: When Spencer questions her mother taking on Garrett's case, she stumbles upon a larger secret; Aria agrees to be Jenna's accompanist.

4.title: Birds of a Feather
4.plot: Hanna and Mona's visits cause tension with Caleb; Emily finds solace after meeting Maya's cousin; Spencer must know the truth about Melissa.

5.title: That Girl Is Poison
5.plot: Aria, Emily, Hanna and Spencer think Jenna's birthday party could be the perfect setting for "A" to strike - and for them to catch their tormentor.

6.title: The Remains of the 'A'
6.plot: A new clue could lead the girls down the wrong path. Emily gets another flashback from "that night," leading to a surprising suspect, and Aria questions Ezra's new influx of cash.

7.title: Crazy
7.plot: With new key evidence in Alison's murder case, Hanna fears that "A" may be framing her after a visit from Det. Wilden; Aria decides that she has to turn to Mona for answers; Someone from Ali and Jason's past arrives in Rosewood..

8.title: Stolen Kisses
8.plot: Trying to explain the drugged flask to Paige leads Emily to more insights about "that night"; Spencer asks Caleb for help; Aria learns about Ezra's past.

9.title: The Kahn Game
9.plot: Aria and Spencer may engage in a heated game of "Truth" to get some answers from Jenna - but are they willing to give up some of their "truths"?

10.title: What Lies Beneath
10.plot: The liars follow a lead about where Maya might have been before her murder; Aria must deal with the aftermath of meeting Ezra's mom.

11.title: Single Fright Female
11.plot: Spencer learns about Paige's shocking past with Ali, but will Emily listen to what her friends have to say?; Aria feels she has to help Ezra move on from his past.

12.title: The Lady Killer
12.plot: Emily is caught in the crossfire as Maya's murderer is revealed; The liars are betrayed by someone close to them.

13.title: This Is a Dark Ride
13.plot: Trick or treat? The Rosewood Halloween Ghost Train becomes one killer party in this special Halloween-themed episode. Plus, Adam Lambert performs.

14.title: She's Better Now
14.plot: Radley Sanitarium gives Mona a clean bill of health, and she heads back to Rosewood High, much to the liars' dismay.

15.title: Mona-Mania
15.plot: Aria, Emily, Hanna and Spencer are sure that Mona is up to her old tricks again, but can they prove it? Meanwhile, Aria's fears about her father grow stronger.

16.title: Misery Loves Company
16.plot: Meredith helps take care of Aria when she is sick - but could she have ulterior motives?; Spencer surprises Toby for their anniversary.

17.title: Out of the Frying Pan, Into the Inferno
17.plot: Will their secrets drive the girls to take desperate actions that could make things worse? Plus, Emily learns more about what Ali may have been hiding the summer before her murder.

18.title: Dead to Me
18.plot: Alison's family is set to bury her again, now that they have her remains, but the girls are divided about going to yet another memorial; Emily visits Dr. Sullivan.

19.title: What Becomes of the Broken-Hearted
19.plot: Spencer takes her anger and hurt over her breakup out on Mona; Aria finds she is spending more time with Wes; Emily and Jason work together.

20.title: Hot Water
20.plot: Holding new information about Detective Wilden, Aria, Emily and Hanna are on the hunt for answers about the detective's past; Spencer finds someone to lean on.

21.title: Out of Sight, Out of Mind
21.plot: Spencer is now ready to talk, but Emily is not ready to accept what she has to say. Hanna helps her mother and keeps a new secret, and wonders if "A" had something to do with it.

22.title: Will the Circle Be Unbroken?
22.plot: Aria, Emily and Hanna try to locate a missing Spencer - but Spencer may not want to be found; Emily meets Olympic gold medalist Missy Franklin.

23.title: I'm Your Puppet
23.plot: "A" plays games with higher stakes. Aria considers things with Ezra and Hanna is thrown in the midst of Caleb's family drama. Spencer looks for answers about Mona's time in Radley.

24.title: A Dangerous gAme
24.plot: In the third season finale, the girls attempt to put an end to the game. With so much happening and new information uncovered, will the girls be ready for what is waiting for them?

1.title: A Is for A-l-i-v-e
1.plot: The PLLs work with Mona to try and get some clarity on A.

2.title: Turn of the Shoe
2.plot: The presence of Mrs. DiLaurentis continues to unnerve all those around her; Toby shares a heartbreaking secret with Spencer; "A" nearly kills Mona.

3.title: Cat's Cradle
3.plot: Hanna worries her mother is keeping a dangerous secret, which leads to an uncomfortable meeting with Detective Holbrook; Melissa returns to Rosewood.

4.title: Face Time
4.plot: A new detective means new questions, and the liars are asked some hard questions; Spencer lays a trap for Melissa.

5.title: Gamma Zeta Die!
5.plot: Spencer and Emily visit a nearby college, but they have different agendas for their time on campus. Hanna is frantic after another horrifying discovery among her mom's things.

6.title: Under the Gun
6.plot: Trying to protect her mom gets Hanna in trouble with the cops; Searching for the recipient of Ali's mysterious phone number leads Spencer and Toby to Ravenswood.

7.title: Crash and Burn, Girl!
7.plot: Caleb and Toby team up to investigate "A" and what happened the night of the lodge fire; Ezra struggles with how he fits into Aria's life; Hanna tries to act normal.

8.title: The Guilty Girl's Handbook
8.plot: Caleb tries to convince Hanna that Mona can't be trusted, causing Mona to prove her loyalty in the most unexpected way; Emily reconnects with her old boss Zoe.

9.title: Into the Deep
9.plot: Paige throws Emily a surprise birthday party; Mona's selfless act provides Hanna and her mother with their first bit of good news; Ezra gets some distressing news.

10.title: The Mirror Has Three Faces
10.plot: Mrs. DiLaurentis offers to let Emily move into Ali's old room; Trying to get involved in Jake's interests; Aria finds an opportunity to follow a lead.

11.title: Bring Down the Hoe
11.plot: Ezra reaches out to Aria, just as she decides to move on with Jake; A Western-themed dance turns into a two-step with "A"; Hanna is stalked by a fellow student.

12.title: Now You See Me, Now You Don't
12.plot: An intriguing riddle from "A" has the liars hitting the road and heading to Ravenswood, where they make a shocking discovery.

13.title: Grave New World
13.plot: The liars crash the Ravenswood Founders Day Celebration after a clue suggests Ali may be alive; Caleb meets a kindred soul, Miranda.

14.title: Who's in the Box?
14.plot: Now it's confirmed that Alison is alive, who was buried in Ali's coffin?

15.title: Love ShAck, Baby
15.plot: After Hanna reveals that she has Ali's diary, the liars hope it can answer some questions, but are they ready to admit which personal story is about them?

16.title: Close Encounters
16.plot: Shana says that Ali wants to meet Emily - and not the other girls - but could it all be part of an "A" plan?; Aria and Hanna deal with matters of the heart.

17.title: Bite Your Tongue
17.plot: "A" goes after Hanna in an unexpected way; Spencer works overtime to decipher the stories in Ali's diary; Aria is upset with the new friend Mike has made.

18.title: Hot for Teacher
18.plot: Spencer's hunt for the truth takes a dangerous turn. Will Hanna be able to figure out Spencer's secret?; Emily looks to make amends with Alison through Shana.

19.title: Shadow Play
19.plot: Spencer's numerous sleepless nights, with the help of prescription pills, take a toll on her as her hunt for Ali and much needed answers continues, teleporting her into the world of 1940s film noir.

20.title: Free Fall
20.plot: Spencer is determined that it is finally time to tell Aria about what she has found out about Ezra, but Emily and Hanna are worried about what it could do to her.

21.title: She's Come Undone
21.plot: Emily, Hanna and Spencer are concerned for Aria as they watch their friend crumble after learning shocking news about Ezra. Not knowing what is true or who to trust, Aria goes looking for answers, not wanting to believe this revelation to be true. Spencer is concerned for Aria, but she is not doing so well herself. Trying to prove to her parents and Toby that she can kick the habit on her own, Spencer has to be careful because one misstep could send her to rehab. Can Spencer really rein it in, or will her constant curiosity and drive be her undoing? Meanwhile, Paige ...

22.title: Cover for Me
22.plot: Emily takes up the sleuthing reins and hunts for answers about Ezra and Mona; Hanna begins a new search after being confronted by Holbrook and Tanner; Spencer and Aria lean on new men in their lives to recover.

23.title: Unbridled
23.plot: It is a rough time for all of the Liars as Spencer is reeling about the memories from her "lost summer," Aria is still nursing a broken heart, Emily is reeling from Paige's betrayal and Hanna unsuccessfully attempts to wade back into the dating pool. But as each girl tries to deal with her individual issues, they must focus their attention on their suspicions surrounding Mrs. DiLaurentis. Assuming that Mrs. D knows more about Ali and the night she went missing, girls decide to help out at her charity bridal fashion show to gain access to the DiLaurentis house to ...

24.title: 'A' Is for Answers
24.plot: The liars finally get answers about the night Ali disappeared. With their newfound knowledge of Ali's long-held secrets, can they figure out who "A" is?

1.title: EscApe from New York
1.plot: The PLLs must dodge their dreaded nemesis, "A," while navigating a world with Alison back in it.

2.title: Whirly Girly
2.plot: The liars try to wrap their head around the new normal; Jason's odd behavior and Kenneth's search for Jessica starts to raise eyebrows.

3.title: Surfing the Aftershocks
3.plot: The liars are forced to live through Ali's latest lie; Hanna and Aria have loose ends with two people who know about Ali's story; Spencer and Emily try to uncover Jason's whereabouts in New York.

4.title: Thrown from the Ride
4.plot: The liars keep their distance from Ali; Spencer finds out Peter has a little more than something to do with Jessica's murder; Aria wants to know more about Shana.

5.title: Miss Me x100
5.plot: Ali returns to Rosewood High and hopes to help heal the damage she did years ago, but not if Mona and her army have anything to say about it; Caleb and an old foe return to Rosewood.

6.title: Run, Ali, Run
6.plot: With 'A' back in their lives, the girls are determined more than ever to know his/her identity. While Ali prepares to run away from Rosewood, Hanna faces a challenge in her relationships. Detective Tanner digs deeper into the death of Shana.

7.title: The Silence of E. Lamb
7.plot: Aria begins her volunteer work at Radley; Spencer borrows Ezra's spy equipment to keep a closer eye on the home front; Ali and Caleb butt heads.

8.title: Scream for Me
8.plot: As Hanna's downward spiral continues, an unfortunate incident with Zack threatens to strain her friendship with Aria. Spencer and Emily dig deeper into Bethany's relationship with Mrs. Dilaurentis.

9.title: March of Crimes
9.plot: Spencer confronts Caleb regarding Hanna's issues; Aria opens up to Ella and questions her marriage to Zack; Emily and Spencer close in on Noel's motives and a call from detective Tanner has Alison perplexed.

10.title: A Dark Ali
10.plot: All eyes are on Alison as she struggles with her response to Cyrus' confession. Melissa hints at knowing the truth and warns Spencer to keep away from Ali. Aria mulls over Spencer's plan of letting everything out in the open with Tanner.

11.title: No One Here Can Love or Understand Me
11.plot: Emily is on the hunt to find out the truth about Alison, seeking unlikely help from Ezra Fitz for information about Cyrus and Alison's connection. Meanwhile Melissa's secret is finally revealed, Hanna asks for Spencer's and Toby's help with Caleb and his drinking problem.

12.title: Taking This One to the Grave
12.plot: The girls join forces with Mona to figure out why Ali reached out to the police. Alison's actions put Spencer in the cross-hairs of Bethany's murder investigation. Mona reveals the truth about Ali, resulting in an aching loss.

13.title: How the 'A' Stole Christmas
13.plot: It is Christmas time and all of the liars are planning on having a great time at the Ice ball, but 'A' has other plans.

14.title: Through a Glass, Darkly
14.plot: The liars get trapped in an abandoned house with A on their trails they struggle to get out. Meanwhile Toby, Spencer, and Caleb try to find out who killed Mona.

15.title: Fresh Meat
15.plot: Now that Alison is in jail, the 4 liars are A's victims. The liars are now scared more than ever.

16.title: Over a Barrel
16.plot: A search for Mona's laptop is underway, and it may lead to Spencer and Caleb to break Toby's rules. Meanwhile, Aria gets sidetracked when she's about to come clean to Ezra; and Hanna and tries to keep her mom's secret when Pastor Ted returns.

17.title: The Bin of Sin
17.plot: The liars are breaking the law. They need to look in the barrel and find out what's inside. But the cops are on their tail and they're getting ready to arrest. What will be in the tank?

18.title: Oh What Hard Luck Stories They All Hand Me
18.plot: Spencer spends time with Jonny; Emily tries to figure out Talia; Hanna digs into the past of Mona's friend Lesli; Mike's behavior concerns Aria; Holbrook returns to Rosewood.

19.title: Out Damned Spot
19.plot: Aria hopes Andrew can be her tutor; Spencer helps Jonny with a new project; Hanna turns to her father for financial assistance; Mike is involved in an incident at the school blood drive.

20.title: Pretty Isn't the Point
20.plot: The liars desperately want to know why Mike gave their blood samples and why he's visiting Alison in jail; Hanna is worried about her fee and getting admission in dance; Emily still hasn't told Talia about her biggest fear; Spencer is still confused with why Toby's not telling her the truth.

21.title: Bloody Hell
21.plot: Equipped with their new information about Mona, the liars decide they need to speak to Alison; Aria quickly learns that Mike's involvement could have serious repercussions for her family; The liars intensify their search for information on "A"; Ali looks to someone surprising for help with her murder trial.

22.title: To Plea or Not to Plea
22.plot: Ali has to choose between saving herself or sacrificing one of the liars.

23.title: The Melody Lingers On
23.plot: The PLL's struggle to find evidence against "A" to help an imprisoned Hanna get out of jail. Meanwhile, Alison's trial is expected very soon and not only does it decide her fate, but it also unravels a lot of secrets the group has told.

24.title: I'm a Good Girl, I Am
24.plot: Alison's trial comes to a close when the prosecution calls a surprise witness; The liars race to find someone or something that can prove Ali's innocence; Mike becomes a target of "A" when it looks like he might be called to testify.

25.title: Welcome to the Dollhouse
25.plot: 'A' has always had fun playing with the liars, but now they have the biggest game to date in store for the girls.

1.title: Game On, Charles
1.plot: The liars are trapped outside of Charles' dollhouse, where his games grow more sinister; Ezra, Caleb and Toby are determined to locate the liars.

2.title: Songs of Innocence
2.plot: The girls struggle with the lasting after effects of their time spent in the dollhouse.

3.title: Songs of Experience
3.plot: The girls' lives have been turned upside down by their captivity and each one of them is looking for answers to make sense of their ordeal.

4.title: Don't Look Now
4.plot: Kenneth DiLaurentis comes clean about the family's connection to Charles and all roads lead to Radley.

5.title: She's No Angel
5.plot: Mona returns to Rosewood in a very fragile state, and Hanna is determined to help her; Emily tries to help Sara; Spencer finds help from someone from her past.

6.title: No Stone Unturned
6.plot: The liars are on the hunt for proof that Lesli is "A", but as they ramp up their investigation, the threats escalate.

7.title: O Brother, Where Art Thou
7.plot: Charles declares he is coming home for his birthday; Mona is shutting Mike out; Hanna gets an unwelcomed surprise.

8.title: FrAmed
8.plot: Aria may not get a chance to see her work on display. Hanna wants to return her scholarship money. Rosewood High considers banning the girls from prom.

9.title: Last Dance
9.plot: As the girls attend their senior prom, A's threats escalate and the girls get one step closer to finding out the truth about Charles DiLaurentis.

10.title: Game Over, Charles
10.plot: After years of torment, the liars will finally come face to face with their tormenter, and uncover the puppeteer behind the hoodie.

11.title: Of Late I Think of Rosewood
11.plot: After five years, the liars return to Rosewood when Alison asks them her to testify for Charlotte's release.

12.title: Charlotte's Web
12.plot: Questions about the new mystery surface as the liars stay in Rosewood; A restless Aria starts to look suspicious; Emily continues to lie about her life in California.

13.title: The Gloves Are On
13.plot: The liars find themselves in familiar territory with the Rosewood P.D; Hanna uses Lucas as an alibi; Emily comes clean about the last five years.

14.title: New Guys, New Lies
14.plot: Hanna admits the truth; Aria and Emily look for answers about Ezra; Spencer and Caleb try to track down the new threat; New love interests emerge and old ones resurface.

15.title: Do Not Disturb
15.plot: Convinced that Sara Harvey is behind the new threats, the liars work together to get answers; Caleb and Hanna make a plan to fight back against the new stalker.

16.title: Where Somebody Waits for Me
16.plot: Spencer learns her mother is keeping a secret; Mona reveals where her true allegiances lie; Emily and Hanna each receive shocking threats.

17.title: We've All Got Baggage
17.plot: The liars investigate a new suspect; Aria tells Ezra the truth about the book; Spencer and Caleb deal with a media leak; Emilly is harassed by the stalker.

18.title: Burn This
18.plot: The liars start taking the threats more seriously; Caleb deals with taking the blame for the leak; Emily tries to track down who attacked her; Aria and Ezra move on with the book.

19.title: Did You Miss Me?
19.plot: Alison is faced with a sudden jeopardy; Hanna and Caleb develop a plan to come face-to-face with their tormentor; Emily and Spencer investigate Mona; Aria and Ezra continue with the book.

20.title: Hush, Hush, Sweet Liars
20.plot: The stalker threatens to kill the liars if they don't divulge Charlotte's killer by the election; Alison experiences strange visions and starts to question her sanity.

locations: Warner Brothers Burbank Studios - 4000 Warner Boulevard, Burbank, California, USA::(exteriors in Rosewood)
imdb.plot outline: Set in the fictional town of Rosewood, Pennsylvania, the series follows the lives of four girls, Aria Montgomery, Hanna Marin, Emily Fields, and Spencer Hastings, whose clique falls apart after the disappearance of their leader, Alison DiLaurentis. One year later, the estranged friends are reunited as they begin receiving messages from a mysterious figure named "A", who threatens to expose their deepest secrets, including ones they thought only Alison knew. At first, they think it's Alison herself, but after her body is found, the girls realize that someone else is planning on ruining their not so perfect lives.
imdb.title: Pretty Little Liars
plot: Four friends band together against an anonymous foe who threatens to reveal their darkest secrets, while also investigating the disappearance of their best friend.::Anonymous

Set in the fictional town of Rosewood, Pennsylvania, the series follows the lives of four girls, Aria Montgomery, Hanna Marin, Emily Fields, and Spencer Hastings, whose clique falls apart after the disappearance of their leader, Alison DiLaurentis. One year later, the estranged friends are reunited as they begin receiving messages from a mysterious figure named "A", who threatens to expose their deepest secrets, including ones they thought only Alison knew. At first, they think it's Alison herself, but after her body is found, the girls realize that someone else is planning on ruining their not so perfect lives.::ahmetkozan

Never trust a pretty girl with an ugly secret - In Rosewood High, there was a group of high school students, Aria, Hanna, Spencer, Emily, and Alison, their leader. Alison was the popular "Queen Bee" of the high school students. Each of the four girls always shared her secrets with Ali. One Labor Day night, the five girls were having a party, when Alison suddenly went missing. Without their leader, the four girls separated. One year later, each girl gets a text message from a mysterious person named "A", including secrets that only Alison should know. Could this person be Alison? If not, then who is it? The girls reunite to find out who this A is and to stop him or her from exposing their secrets.::ahmetkozan

In Rosewood, Pennsylvania, a once tight knit group of girls have to band back together after the leader of their group, Alison DiLaurentis goes mysteriously and unexplainably missing. They then start getting texts from an anonymous source that soon turns their lives more dangerous then they can imagine, and threatens to ruin everything that is keeping them sane. They have to work together to save their families, relationships, and their own lives before it's to late, and everything is ruined once and for all.

Four best friends are rattled when their Queen Bee Alison DiLaurentis dies during a party. A year later, the mysterious "A" begins to torment them with threats laced with secrets they only ever told Ali. Is Ali still alive? And will the girls ever find out who their masked tormentor is? Find out in the twisted, confusing, dark tale of _Pretty Little Liars_ (qv). Episodes Tuesdays at 9 on Freeform.::Colina

In this mysterious series, five girls rule the halls of Rosewood High. One night takes a wrong turn when the queen bee and leader of the group, Alison DiLaurentis, goes missing, unexpectedly. A year after her disappearance, the estrange friends reunite, still unknowing of what happened to their best friend. The four friends, Hanna Marin, Emily Fields, Aria Montgomery, and Spencer Hastings, begin to recieve texts from an anonymous messenger containing their deepest, darkest secrets. First, they think its their missing friend, but when the police find her body, they must discover who this nameless, faceless, dangerous stranger is and find out what happened to their best friend while protecting their secrets and loved ones.::ahmetkozan
synopsis: 1 year ago, Allison, the queen bee of the four friends, Aria, Spencer, Hanna, and Emily, went missing. Since her disappearance, the four girls became less close, with Aria moving to Iceland, Hanna losing weight, Spencer in competition with her older sister, Melissa, and Emily experimenting with her sexuality. When Aria comes back from Iceland, she hooks up with a guy from a bar, who turns out to be her English teacher. Hanna gets arrested for stealing sunglasses from the mall, and her mother has sex with the arresting officer to get Hanna out of trouble. Tired of always coming second to Melissa, Spencer makes out with her fiancee, causing the engagement to end. Emily meets the new girl who moves into Rosewood, Maya, and feels something a little more than friendship for her. When Aria moves back to Rosewood, all four girls receive strange and threatening messages from "A", who they believe could possibly be Allison, considering the messages were about exposing both present and past secrets- secrets only Allison knew about. The past secrets included Aria's father cheating on her mother with his student, Spencer kissing Melissa's previous boyfriend, Emily's romantic feelings for Allison, Hanna's bulimia to become skinny, and one night when Allison claimed to see a boy named Toby peeping through the window and threw a stink bomb in the garage, causing a fire, and blinding Toby's step-sister, Jenna. Even after Allison's dead body was found and a funeral was held, the girls keep receiving texts from A. Aria, Spencer, Hanna, and Emily must find out who A is before he/she reveals all of their deepest, darkest secrets.
